values:
That's IT. If Michael writes Mother and Father about me and my habits ONE MORE TIME, I will make it my goal to decapitate him with my bare hands. That bastard.

Tristan, I need soothing.

[Private] Damn him, damn my brother to a fucking sodding hell. If he hadn't told Mother and Father about my stash, I'd have the money I need to buy what I want. I want acid, and I want it now. But, nooooo, dearest Michael had to cover his own tracks by making the parents focus on mine. God, I just hope Tristan's in a willing mood. [/Private] Is it raining outside? I really hope it isn't, because it would be a travesty if my hair got wet while I was taking a...er...break. Then again, I suppose I could always do a rain repelling charm, if I can remember it.
